name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, straw, ezcmac, VandenBos, Lolsworth, zcross00, karljw, symbolsoup, 1000Hz, riotdejaneiro, mikeronomicon, Thorfinn, Hipjiverobot, DiamondMonster, DeimosRising, Carpetbag, Catachresis, siliconslick, mercuri0us, trisha, barfighting, iloveyoucupcake, regrepnsnefpoh, mtrott, Koremora, TheLoneliestMonkey, gtc, Sargasm, SoManyWhales, atticusonline, HolyQ, Baryonyx, Carrot, mira, newspaperdrone, aHatOfPig, Scorpion13, regrepsnefpoh, Afkpuz, Tragic_Johnson, FinnS, Herr_Modin, sncether, eRiUukFJk, Audhumla, heatbag, holly_golightly, DeathwishJones, morbo, afvbs)

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, Carpetbag, salvagebar, rowboat, Connellingus, slalvation)

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goocifer, rowboat, Connellingus, Taidje_Khan)

name: mikekitchell
text: I am so confused about all of the quotation marks you have used here.

name: epicurus
text: They are supposed to automatically convey the voice of that guy in the movie trailers god dammit.

name: professorhazard
text: Don't worry, guy with Sealab avatar. It's so clearly the voice of Don LaFontaine.

name: heccibiggs
text: Hahahaha that is absolutely fantastic. You got it down perfectly. I wish to make it real.

name: i_love_kate
text: I've always wondered what will happen when that guy dies.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: Umm... he died a month or so back?

name: i_love_kate
text: Heh, whatever.

name: tasteful
text: post/av

name: thorfinn
text: Asherdan clearly understands the comic at a level that we could never hope to reach.  I commend him on his insight and wisdom.  The comment threads would not be complete without his douchebaggery.

name: catachresis
text: I kind of regret being a dick (a 5-chubby dick) here, because asherdan has all sorts of retarded internet backlash on him right now

name: gouldgonewild
text: 5-chubby dick is an interesting term

name: cailetshadow
text: would fit right into the Book of Revelations.

name: lux
text: 5-chubby dick: when your hard-on is so exemplary as to merit five of them (in quality, not quantity).

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, symbolsoup, Overmedicated, Thorfinn, FeralChicken, Moraiat, hikikomori, Koremora, atticusonline, Carrot, Scorpion13, eRiUukFJk, Audhumla, stormagnet, SPECTRE, cjfoster, afvbs, SotiCoto)

name: epicurus
text: And I almost regret riding on your coattails. But remember! Whatever 'erdan may say or do, his past misdeeds are forever graven into the ASSETBAR.

name: cailetshadow
text: chubbied for 'erdan. Incisive and subtle.

name: semiquaver
text: Like an incision. By a doctor.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: A subtle doctor.

name: snowman
text: A subtle, incisive doctor. Who makes incisions .

name: semiquaver
text: This is starting to sound like Dr. McNinja's work.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Now I'm regretting having already made a Dr. Who reference on one of your comments because it's so much more appropriate here.

name: fermatprime
text: Seriously awesome avatar/comment synergy...

name: natashamarie
text: Rays face in panel 5 is the best.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Onstad is the master of the mid-comic cutaway punchline.

name: werthog42
text: I'm still not exactly sure WHY Ray's face looks like that. Has he noticed the reader, intruding on his personal area? Does he just like to make faces when he's alone? Or is he just having a hard time... Getting things moving?

name: djwhiterabbit
text: good question!  maybe ray doesn't like being the comic strip version of a cutaway.

name: chaesar
text: That's the face you make when you're drinkin' and stinkin'

name: zem
text: this comment owns!!!

name: saru
text: I've decided that he's either noticed the reader, or just got a good whiff of what came out of his hind end.

name: envika
text: "Yeah man, we doin' this! YEAHHHHH!"

name: buttermoths
text: Don't know man, that doesn't look like the Sidesaddle to me...

name: mattylite
text: I always thought he was burping.  'Cuz he just took a swig from that bottle.  I thas the rhythm of swigging and burping, you know, like in real life.

name: rasalghul
text: Silent panel, breaking the 4th wall?  I think G-d just acknowledged 'Erdan's existence.

name: epicurus
text: I really dig uncle culpepper. This one is another of my favourites.

name: evolume
text: do you drink on the can now that you've seen this strip?

name: mikekitchell
text: I have always drunk on the can.

name: epicurus
text:
I once peed into an empty in the bathroom while drinking. Do I get some sort of medal? For the record, I set the empty on top of a totally useable toilet.

I am not proud of this, but I would like that medal.

name: tekende
text: Epicurus, pissing into an empty, calling me faggot. He cannot see me.

name: epicurus
text: It's like we went to the same high school or something.

name: trollcollins
text: Chubby for the candor. I admire it. The ratio of people who have done this to people who will admit to doing this is not insignificant.

name: buttermoths
text: I once peed into a wastepaper basket in a friend's bathroom (I was drunk). The reason for this dickishness was that the wastepaper basket was designed to look like a panda and I didn't like the way it was staring at me .

name: epicurus
text: A person who has been drunk knows exactly what you mean. A person who has never been drunk is now less likely to ever drink.

name: snowman
text: Man, I had forgotten about this, but I once had an hour-long conversation with a chair, while extremely drunk of course.  The conversation turned into an argument, which culminated in me kicking the chair over angrily before walking inside to pass out.

name: theguitarhero
text: I have sober-pissed into a trash can before.

name: whuppins
text: Strip gains a full point for panel 5.

name: nathanielperson
text: Hadn't Ray and Tina been broken up forever by this strip? I guess maybe they got back together.

name: ktistecmachine
text:
Situation: A dude and a lady. Dude says, "French me." She does. They get mad-rutty. Mad-rutty! Her Dolce and Gabbanas lie on the floor.

A year later. Two. Her Dolce and Gabbanas are long forgotten by the dude, as is the lady. The lady calls. She wants her Dolce and Gabbanas back.

name: centipede_damascus
text: What woman can resist a southern gentleman's compliments?

name: tomsonlocal
text: Look at Ray all breaking the fourth wall, the man don't give a damn when he is on the John.

name: excusemesenator
text: Panel five never ceases to crack me the hell up.

name: cousinted
text: "Madame, I am prepared to be the only gentleman to gaze upon your secret junk"

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Where does Ray put his thong when he's on the crapper?

name: relaxing
text: A-Around his ankles...?

name: heccibiggs
text: Yeah that's what I figured.

name: takepills
text: five'd simply because ray drinks and then has that amazing look on his face in panel 5

name: dumase
text: fourth wall breaking in the fifth panel for the win

name: comrade_tom
text: 4th wall!

name: enigmaticforce
text: This is Ray's life.  Good to the last drop.

name: heccibiggs
text: I will be forever haunted by Ray looking directly at me with that expression while drinking on the toilet.

name: dougthehead
text: Ray on the toilet and the alt text about Uncle Culpepper "pulling up to the bumper" are two reasons why this strip is unforgettable, if not always for the most sanity-preserving reasons.

name: skaterpix
text: HAHA! Ray, Ray, Ray! Haha

name: caddon
text:
From OhNoRobot:
[[Ray is on the toilet, drinking a beer and daring you, the reader, to challenge him for his actions.]]

name: cpnglxynchos
text: man that needs to be chubbified.

name: tasteful
text: panel 5

name: redheron
text:
If panel five isn't on a t-shirt or something, it needs to be. Perhaps preceded by panel four. I'd buy it.

Hell, I'd wear it to church.

name: kalethan
text: when I was...old enough to know better, my father found me peeing into a trash can in the garage...he took me inside and spanked me soundly for a minute, trying his hardest not to let his giggles burst forth in outright guffaws...it was clear that he did not want me to do that anymore but was incredibly amused...it's uncanny how Onstad can get SO MUCH into, "I'm...I'm Tina, who's this?" ... it's ON, and you know it Then, not Later

name: foiegrastaco
text: When I was about 12 and babysitting my younger siblings, I assisted my 7 y/o brother in drawing angry eyes, one apiece, on his butt-cheeks, and then he showed our mom when she got home. She had this face that said "sweet jesus that is one of the funniest things I have ever seen but these kids need to learn a valuable lesson about not drawing on the asses of those 5-7 years younger than them" and we all couldn't understand why she was mad, and the best she could come up with was "those markers are very expensive". They were not.

name: greenkoolayd
text: im suspicious of uncle culpepper.  would a southern gentlemen like pizza and jello shooters?

name: greenkoolayd
text: also, tina is a dumb hoochie.
